author: gkossakowski
msg: COCOON-2026: Load more XSL files via servlet: protocol.

author: jcompagner
msg: removed the check if same collection
fixed the unit test so that the fields are not final anymore (they are set now in update model)

author: dkulp
msg: * Update WSDLServiceFactory to use the ResourceManager as well as URI resolvers
* Update ServletContextResolver to handle other stuff in the war
* Update the frontends to record wsdl location as a String (so WEB-INF/wsdl/Foo.wsdl works)
* Update to have Servlet reset the default buses so the right one has a chance of being picked up.  (Dan D. has a better fix for this coming)
* Add ThreadLocal default bus support (which sevlet also sets)

author: jonl
msg: Search for localizable resources for validation failure should begin at the FormComponent and not on the parent.  It is useful for specialized subclasses of FormComponent to be able to specify their own errors.  For example, EmailField might extend TextField and do validation for emails.  Default validation errors can then be specified by that reusable component.
